articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of Fiji
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of Fiji
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message on Thursday to Josaia Voreqe Bainimarama on his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Fiji.
					 The message wished the prime minister of Fiji greater success in the work for the national prosperity, expressing the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger.

articles.title: NDC Policy Department Blasts Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invectives
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department Blasts Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Invectives 
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement Saturday termed Park Geun Hye the primary root cause of deteriorating the north-south relations and fostering mistrust and confrontation.
					 Her disposition was fully revealed through the unspeakable invectives she let loose against the DPRK as she pleased during her recent trip to the U.S., lashing all Koreans into fury, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 She labeled the DPRK the "only criminal country that carried out a nuclear test in the 21st century", blustering that the DPRK's nuclear weapons are the "biggest threat" to peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and its nuclear activities are the "total denial" of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty.
					
					 Park should properly know that the mission of the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is to terminate the nuclear threat and blackmail that have been escalated by the U.S., to eliminate the U.S. imperialists, robbers keen on swallowing up the land of Korea and to throw overboard modern day sycophants and traitors like Park who brings only national disgrace and tragedy, pursuant to the U.S. line.
					
					 Nothing will be more foolish than trying to force the army and people of the DPRK to lay down the treasured sword--nukes.
					
					 Park's nature was also revealed when she malignantly took issue with the "human rights issue" of the DPRK at the UN arena.
					
					 She went so impudent as to call for implementing what she called "recommendations" adopted by the UN Human Rights Council, while letting loose vitriol in a bid to give impression that the international community is greatly concerned about the "north's human rights issue".
					
					 She went the lengths of making such provocative vituperation that "north's human rights office" will be set up in south Korea.
					
					 Originally, the DPRK has never recognized any "resolution" adopted by the UN that had been reduced to a voting machine of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 If the UN is to remain true to its original mission, though belatedly, and if it is so concerned about the improvement of human rights, it should buckle down to transforming south Korean society and U.S. society that turned into veritable hells and theatres of human rights abuses under the unpopular rule and the "yusin" fascist dictatorship of modern version.
					
					 Park Geun Hye had better build a "south's human rights office ", not a "north's human rights office", and introduce best man-centered, Korean-style socialism in the world so that south Korea may not remain a tundra of human rights causing miserable death.
					
					 She was so obsessed by confrontation with fellow countrymen at the UN arena that she did not hesitate to shield human scum as "defectors from the north" though they had been de-listed as inhabitants long ago.
					
					 The foolish efforts of Park to gain something by pinning hope on such human scum as "defectors from the north" and having them under her wings would only prompt all fellow countrymen and the nation to condemn her for being an indecent woman reeking off nasty smell.
					
					 She fully disclosed her inveterate ambition for achieving "unification through absorption" when she referred to the lapse of 25 years since the Berlin Wall was pulled down. If she truly wants "demolition of barrier", she should make a bold decision to pull down, to begin with, the concrete wall built by her father and his followers to divide the territory of the country into two. 
					
					 This time she fully revealed herself she is a modern-type sycophant and traitor and the worst traitor for all ages.
					
					 If the north-south relations are to be improved and peace and stability of the nation ensured, it is necessary to decisively eliminate such hordes of traitors as Park. This is the conclusion drawn by the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Her miserable doom has already been sealed.

articles.title: Talks Held between Parliamentary Delegations of DPRK and Mongolia
articles.content:
Talks Held between Parliamentary Delegations of DPRK and Mongolia 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Talks between a delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and a delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Saturday. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the SPA led by Vice-Chairman An Tong Chun and from the Mongolian side members of the said delegation led by Vice-Chairman R. Gonchigdorj, Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Manibadrakh Ganbold and his embassy officials. 
					
					 Both sides at the talks exchanged views on the issue of boosting the relations between the two parliaments and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: SPA Hosts Reception for Mongolian Parliamentary Delegation
articles.content:
SPA Hosts Reception for Mongolian Parliamentary Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK hosted a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday. 
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation led by Vice-Chairman R. Gonchigdorj, Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Manibadrakh Ganbold and his embassy officials.
					
					 Present there were Chairman of the SPA Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Chairman An Tong Chun, Chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group Thae Hyong Chol and officials concerned.

articles.title: Mongolian Parliamentary Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Mongolian Parliamentary Delegation Arrives 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia led by Vice-Chairman R. Gonchigdorj arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: Delegation of Mongolian Women's Association Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Mongolian Women's Association Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Social Democracy Mongolian Women's Association led by President Tsogzolmaa Tsedenbal, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets at the old home of the President. They went round historic relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic careers of his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 To preserve the old home of the distinguished leader of the revolution to its original state is a very important work for successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the Korean revolution pioneered by him.
					
					 It is something surprising that the great man was born in such simple and modest family.
					
					 As the great President Kim Il Sung grew up with a noble aim of revolution on such basis, he could achieve the historic cause of national liberation, I think.
					
					 I was deeply impressed to learn that all his family members, in particular, were ardent patriots and fighters who devoted their all to the revolution.
					
					 He provided the excellent relations of friendship between Mongolia and the DPRK.
					
					 I am sure that this historic tradition will be carried forward forever and developed in the future, too.
					
					 Meanwhile, the guests toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Kyongsang Kindergarten, etc.

articles.title: Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Depart
articles.content:
Participants in Int'l Trade Fair Depart
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions left here on Saturday after participating in the 10th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Monument to Field Guidance of Kim Jong Il Erected
articles.content:
Monument to Field Guidance of Kim Jong Il Erected 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A monument to the field guidance given by leader Kim Jong Il was erected at the Pyongyang Catfish Farm. 
					 He unfolded the plan for building the catfish farm, built it and settled all problems arising in managing and operating it.
					
					 He visited it in September, Juche 98 (2009) and gave precious instructions to develop modern fishing technology in our own way.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place Saturday.

articles.title: Concert Marking 30th Anniversary of Yun I Sang Music Institute Opens
articles.content:
Concert Marking 30th Anniversary of Yun I Sang Music Institute Opens 
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A concert marking the 30th founding anniversary of the Yun I Sang Music Institute opened. 
					 The concert was given at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall Saturday. 
					
					 It was enjoyed by Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, Director of the Yun I Sang Music Institute Hong Kyong Ho, officials concerned, creators and artistes of national art organizations, teachers and students of the art educational field and citizens. 
					
					 Among the audience were those concerned of the Yun I Sang Peace Foundation of south Korea and overseas Koreans. 
					
					 Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, made a speech prior to the concert. 
					
					 The repertoire of the concert which started with orchestra "Don't Advance, Night of Pyongyang" included dancing fantasia for grand orchestra "Dance Music" and other pieces composed by Yun I Sang. 
					
					 The concert will last till Sept. 29.

articles.title: DPRK Men's Football Team Advances into Quarterfinals at 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Men's Football Team Advances into Quarterfinals at 17th Asian Games
						
 Inchon, September 26 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The DPRK men's football team on Sept. 26 trounced its Indonesian rival 4-1 to advance into the quarterfinals at the 17th Asian Games.
					 Pak Kwang Ryong of the team scored its first goal by heading at the point 7m away from the goalmouth of its rival at around 19th minute of the match and its second goal came when Jo Kwang Son headed the ball into the goalmouth of its rival at the point 8m away from it at around fortieth minute of the match.
					
					 Jong Il Gwan scored two more goals.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Qualified to Play Semifinals in Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Qualified to Play Semifinals in Asian Games 
						
 Inchon, September 26 (KCNA Correspondent) -- There took place the quarterfinals between the DPRK and Chinese women's football teams in the 17th Asian Games on Friday. 
					 Ho Un Byol headed the ball into the goalmouth of the Chinese rival at around the 73rd minute of the match. 
					
					 The DPRK team beat its rival 1:0 to be qualified to play the semifinals.

articles.title: Preparations for 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Brisk in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 2014 provincial mass sports contest to be held in Pyongyang from Oct. 1 to 10 are gaining momentum in the DPRK.
					  In this regard, an official concerned of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, told KCNA:
					
					 Provinces and municipalities have already picked out their players through selection tournaments. And those selected are getting intensive training.
					
					 The hopefuls for the contest are considered to be teams from South Phyongan Province, South Hwanghae Province and Nampho Municipality, who took top three places in the 2013 provincial mass sports contest.
					
					 It is the first time for teams from Pyongyang and Rason cities to participate in the contest. But they are expected to have great capabilities.
					
					 In the event of ssirum (Korean wrestling), the team from North Phyongan Province is believed to win the title as it has Ri Jo Won, four times winner of the Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest.

articles.title: DPRK: National Contest of Sport Announcing
articles.content:
DPRK: National Contest of Sport Announcing
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A national contest for sport announcing took place at sports village in Chongchun Street here on September 23-27.
					 The contest, divided into compulsory and voluntary programs, was attended by 60 persons, including workers, office clerks and students selected from provinces and municipalities.
					
					 The contest was held in forms of reading on-the-scene reports on matches and scripts for sport common knowledge and announcing games on video.
					
					 Its standings were published before an awarding ceremony on Saturday. The first place was taken by Kang Kum Ju, a student of Pyongyang City Commercial School.
					
					 A judge told KCNA that the contest was of significance in finding out more persons talented in art of sport announcing and improving their abilities.

articles.title: New Type of Vibration Measurement and Balancing Apparatus Developed
articles.content:
New Type of Vibration Measurement and Balancing Apparatus Developed
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Mechanical Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK recently developed a new type of vibration measurement and balancing apparatus, which is of great economic value.
					 The apparatus consists of vibration sensor, power unit, one-chip computer, infrared-sensing proximity switch and display. It is easy to use and high in measuring and analyzing exactitude with wide range of application.
					
					 It makes it possible to take real-time measurement of vibration of rotary machines caused by imbalance of rotators, discrepancy of axis, abrasion of antifriction and sleeve bearings, etc. and trace faults in them.
					
					 And it has one-side or two-sides balancing functions, so as to balance rotators weighing from kilograms to tens of tons on the spot.
					
					 The apparatus has been already introduced to Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, Sunchon Cement Complex and other industrial establishments to prove effective in lengthening the serviceable life of machines.

articles.title: Papers Mark World Day of Tourism
articles.content:
Papers Mark World Day of Tourism 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Papers in the DPRK Saturday observe World Day of Tourism.
					 The DPRK will pay deep attention to the development of tourism, in the future, too, to deepen the friendship and cooperation with the people of different countries and make the people lead a wealthier and more civilized life for material and cultural entertainment to their heart's content, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 "Tourism and Community Development" is the theme of World Day of Tourism this year.
					
					 The event on the Day marks an important occasion in making tourism contribute to cooperation and social progress among countries to suit its mission and purpose.
					
					 The DPRK has taken an active part in the international tourist activities and tried to meet the requirements and abide by the principles of tourism since it became a member of the World Tourism Organization in 1987.
					
					 There are lots of fascinating tourist destinations in the DPRK, namely Pyongyang, Kaesong, Nampho, Mts. Paektu, Kumgang, Myohyang, Chilbo, Kuwol and Jongbang and Ryongmun Cavern.
					
					 The work to arrange new tourist areas is under way and a great concern is directed to providing conditions for the development of tourism.
					
					 Last year alone the Masikryong Ski Resort and many other world-class cultural and tourist facilities including the Munsu Water Park and Mirim Riding Club took shape in Pyongyang and across the country.
					
					 Minju Joson says the DPRK government will direct more efforts to tourism which promotes mutual understanding and cultural ties among the peoples across the world and steadily develop tourism in the future, too.

articles.title: Party's Unity Guarantees Final Victory of Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Party's Unity Guarantees Final Victory of Revolution: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The unbreakable unity and cohesion of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) are the eternal foundation of the Songun revolution, source of inexhaustible strength and sure guarantee for the victory of the revolution, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. 
					 The article notes:
					
					 The WPK has waged a strenuous struggle for its unity and cohesion under the banner of the Juche idea in the whole period of leading the revolution and in this course it has turned into an invincible revolutionary party united close around the leader in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung clarified the idea of achieving unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks based on one thought and one purpose from the very day he embarked on the road of the revolution, and established a tradition of single-minded unity by warm comradeship. In the whole period of steering the revolution he consolidated the organizational and ideological foundation of the party as firm as a rock and victoriously led the revolution and construction by dint of unity. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il regarded it as the core and fundamental way of the work for achieving single-minded unity to establish the party's monolithic ideological system and remarkably increased  the might of the party's unity and cohesion based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader, developing the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type shining with the august name of the President and the harmonious whole in which all the party members share the idea, intention and affection with the leader. 
					
					 Today Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the party and has wisely led the party so that it may firmly preserve its revolutionary character as the leader's party. 
					
					 The article calls upon all officials, party members and other people to further strengthen the unity and cohesion of the party, the greatest legacy of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, and bring earlier the final victory of the great Paektusan nation with the might of unity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK Reckless Remarks
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, addressing a recent meeting of directors of defence academies of the 18th ASEAN Regional Forum, blustered that "nukes and missiles of the north" are becoming "factors of threatening peace" not only on the Korean Peninsula but  in the Asia-Pacific region and the world. And he begged for "cooperation" in coping with this.
					 At a minister-level event on someone's "human rights" sponsored by the U.S. Secretary of State, Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, asserted that the development of nuclear weapons "threatening peace" and the call for "promoting human rights" are contradictory to each other. And he vociferated about "dialogue for human rights" and "implementation of recommendation".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday terms it imprudent balderdash of those disturbing peace and abusing human rights.
					
					 What Han Min Gu and Yun Pyong Se uttered is shameless jargons making profound confusing of right and wrong, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence serves as a reliable treasured sword protecting the human rights of the working people as it is providing a military guarantee for defending the sovereignty from foreign forces' aggression.
					
					 To bolster up the nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity is the way of defending the sovereignty of the nation and protecting the worthy life of the popular masses in the present world where aggression and high-handed practices are rampant.
					
					 Great irony is that the puppet forces talk a lot about "dialogue for human rights" and "recommendation" while concealing their poor human rights performance in disregard of such clear reason.
					
					 With no rhetoric can they cover up their true colors as disturbers of peace and human rights abusers.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. held a "high-level meeting on human rights in north Korea" on Sept. 23 on the sidelines of the 69th UN General Assembly now under way in New York.
					 At the meeting the U.S. tried to mislead public opinion by creating impression that a "report" of the "fact-finding committee" on the human rights performance in the DPRK and a "resolution" of the UN Human Rights Council which had been already fabricated represented "the will of the world public."
					
					 The meeting was nothing but a despicable "human rights" burlesque staged against the DPRK as part of the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized the "report", "resolution" and the like of hostile forces as they were prompted by their inveterate repugnancy and plots against it and will never accept them in the future, too. This is because there cannot exist any human rights issue under the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses, the system giving top priority to the interests and convenience of the people and regarding them as absolute.
					
					 The DPRK provides a state guarantee of all rights including the rights to exist, live and develop to the people by firmly defending its ideology and social system. That's why it says human rights precisely mean the state sovereignty.
					
					 As far as the "report" and "resolution" made at the meeting are concerned, they are all lies and fabrications cooked up by dishonest hostile forces in a back room before going through any normal procedures without any consultation with the DPRK.
					
					 They are nothing but hackneyed misinformation spread by the U.S. to do harm to the DPRK and "testimonies" made by criminals who defected from the DPRK after betraying even their country, nation, parents, brothers and sisters.
					
					 If the U.S. was concerned for the settlement of the problem even a bit, it should have produced an impartial report through full discussion and legitimate procedures after studying the report of the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies which was recently published, though belatedly.
					
					 The U.S. turned down an official request made by the DPRK delegation for its participation in the meeting. This fact alone clearly proves that the discussion on such issue has no equity and it was part of the U.S. sinister plots against the DPRK.
					
					  The U.S. act of barring the DPRK delegation from taking part in the meeting for discussing the "issue" of the DPRK while talking about "dialogue on human rights" goes to prove that the U.S. recent anti-DPRK campaign over the "human rights issue" has nothing in common with the genuine human rights. 
					
					 No wonder, even U.S. media expressed skepticism about the "human rights" campaign launched by the U.S. and others rejecting the DPRK delegation's proposed participation in the meeting and are reporting the DPRK's just assertions about the human rights issue every day. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which should be forced to sit in the dock at a human rights tribunal. 
					
					 The U.S. is a top class criminal state which has neither justification nor face to pull up other countries as it is the worst human rights abuser in the world. 
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces' persistent political plots, economic sanctions and military threats lay big hurdles in the way of the DPRK government's efforts to promote people's human rights. 
					
					 It is the sinister aim sought by the U.S. in desperately kicking up such human rights campaign to tarnish the international image of the single-mindedly united DPRK and bolster up the lever for stifling it. 
					
					 Such ruckus of the U.S. would only bring into bolder relief its despicable true colors as the worst human rights abuser.

articles.title: S. Korean Unionists Protest against Moves to Open Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Unionists Protest against Moves to Open Rice Market 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions at a press conference in Seoul on September 24 declared a joint action of workers and farmers to check the puppet authorities' moves to open the rice market.
					 At the press conference the speakers said their sit-in is in protest against the regime keen to open the rice market.
					
					 The present regime has never enforced a right agricultural policy, they deplored, accusing it of bringing agriculture to ruin by opening the rice market.
					
					 The rice issue is not just an issue of the farmers, they said, stressing the need for workers and other people to join them in their actions against the opening of the rice market.
					
					 They can never give up agriculture come what may, they said, stressing that they would fight it out against the ruling forces which are driving farmers into the street and threatening the life of the people.
					
					 The workers affiliated to the confederation would actively join the farmers in their protest against the opening of the rice market, they declared.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Ryongam, South Jolla Province of south Korea on September 24, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 Bird flu broke out in the area early this year, causing heavy damage.

articles.title: Quake Hits Waters Off Ulsan, S. Korea
articles.content:
Quake Hits Waters Off Ulsan, S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.8 on the Richter scale jolted waters 67 km southeast of Ulsan, south Korea on Sept. 25, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 This was the fifth quake that hit the waters this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on Sept. 20 "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Fourth Conference of Primary Officials of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on September 18, Juche 103 (2014).
					 The letter deals with the glorious path covered by young Koreans while glorifying the annals of revolution with heroic feats and proud victories under the wise guidance and loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It indicates the tasks and ways for young Koreans to successfully play their role as the young vanguard of the party in the on-going historic advance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by German, Nigerian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by German, Nigerian Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- German and Nigerian organizations posted articles on their websites on Sept. 18 and 20 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article praising her revolutionary career and feats, illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing together with her.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Great life" which said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, who joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army organized by the President in September 1935, fought with arms until Korea was liberated.
					
					 It is hard to image that a woman fights, eating and sleeping in mountains.
					
					 She earned fame as a woman commander of Mt. Paektu in the days of the hard-fought anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Some letters written by members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on barked trees are praising her.
					
					 After the liberation of the country she made a great contribution to building a new country.
					
					 In the days of the anti-Japanese war and even after the liberation of the country she devotedly defended the President.
					
					 Her loyalty to the President is still moving all people.
					
					 She is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but mankind.

articles.title: Hot Wind of Sports in DPRK Introduced by French Paper
articles.content:
Hot Wind of Sports in DPRK Introduced by French Paper
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The French paper Monde on Sept. 17 introduced the hot wind of sports in the DPRK.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Football is one of popular sporting events in the DPRK.
					
					 There are football fields in every part of the country.
					
					 Promising footballers of the national team are growing up at Pyongyang International Football School built last year.
					
					 The DPRK men's football team defeated its Chinese rival 3:0 in the group league matches of the 17th Asian Games.
					
					 A strong hot wind of sports is being raised in the DPRK not only in football but all other events.
					
					 In recent years, a lot of excellent sports and amusement facilities and bases, including the Munsu Water Park, the Mirim Riding Club and the Chongchun Street Sports Village, have been built or remodeled in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Sports are developing in the DPRK thanks to the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is working hard to improve the people's standard of living, always finding himself among the people.

articles.title: Portavoz del Departamento de Politica del CDN denuncia a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz del Departamento de Politica del CDN denuncia a Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 27, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea apunta que Park Geun-hye es la primera causa raiz que empeora las relaciones intercoreanas y fomenta la desgracia y confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas, y continua:
					Eso se ha comprobado en los disparates dichos por ella en su reciente estancia en Estados Unidos, de los cuales se monta en colera toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Park chismeo que la RPDC es el "unico Estado criminal que ha ejecutado en el siglo 21 la prueba nuclear", las armas nucleares de ella constituyen la "amenaza mas grande" para la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y sus actividades nucleares significan la "negativa total" al Tratado de No Proliferacion (TNP).
					
					Park Geun-hye debe saber bien que la mision del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC reside en acabar con la creciente amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. y exterminar al imperialismo norteamericano deseoso de ocupar todo el territorio coreano y a los vendepatrias de version moderna como ella que trae solo la verguenza y tragedia de la nacion siendo satelite del imperio.
					
					Por lo tanto, no habria otra accion tan absurda que tratar de eliminar el disuasivo nuclear empunado con firmeza por el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					La naturaleza de Park se ha expuesto en la palestra de la ONU donde ella cuestiono obstinadamente el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Diciendo que el "problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea" es la cuestion a que presta mayor atencion y se preocupa la sociedad internacional, ella se atrevio a decir que la RPDC debe ejecutar los "articulos recomendados" del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU.
					
					Para colmo, dijo que instaurara en el Sur de Corea hasta la "Oficina de DDHH del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Desde el principio, la RPDC no ha reconocido ninguna "resolucion" de la ONU convertida en la herramienta de votacion de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					Si la ONU quiere ser fiel a su mision, aunque tardiamente, y esta interesada en la mejora de la situacion de DDHH, debe enfrascarse en transformar primero la sociedad surcoreana, convertida en el infierno de seres humanos y en la tierra de peor violacion de DDHH debido a la politica antipopular y la dictadura fascista de "Yusin" (renovacion) de version moderna, y la sociedad norteamericana identica a aquella.
					
					Park debe instalar la "oficina de DDHH del Sur de Corea", en lugar de "la del Norte de Corea", y aceptar el socialismo al estilo de la RPDC centrado en el hombre, el mas ventajoso del mundo, para que el suelo surcoreano no se haga la tierra de suicidios.
					
					En su fiebre de enfrentamiento fratricida, Park no vacilo en defender en el escenario de la ONU a las escorias humanas, que fueron eliminadas de la lista de seres humanos, describiendolas como "ciudadanos que salieron del Norte de Corea".
					
					Ella intenta conseguir algo cifrando alguna esperanza en esa chusma que dejo de ser humanos hace mucho tiempo, lo cual causa las denuncias de todos los compatriotas.
					
					Al referirse al desmantelamiento del muro de Berlin, ella expuso abiertamente su arraigado intento de lograr la "unificacion mediante la absorcion".
					
					Si ella desea tanto el "desmantelamiento de muro", debe tomar primero la valiente decision de eliminar la muralla de hormigon armado construida por su padre y sus satelites para dividir en dos partes el territorio nacional.
					
					Esta vez, Park demostro por si sola su atributo de vendepatria de version moderna y traidora mas connotada
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sacan la conclusion de que hay que liquidar tajantemente a los traidores como Park para el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S y para la paz y estabilidad de la nacion.
					
					Park ya esta condenada al fin tragico.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones de parlamentarios RPDC-Mongolia
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones de parlamentarios RPDC-Mongolia
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 27 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre las delegaciones de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del Gran Hural del Estado de Mongolia.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion coreana presidida por su vicepresidente An Tong Chun y los integrantes de la delegacion de Mongolia encabezada por el vicepresidente R. Gonchigdorj asi como el embajador mongol Manibadrakh Ganbold y otros miembros de la embajada de Mongolia en Corea.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron sus criterios sobre el problema de desarrollar mas las relaciones entre los parlamentos de los dos paises y otros temas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Edificado nuevo monumento en Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Edificado nuevo monumento en Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Se levanto en la Fabrica de Siluros de Pyongyang nuevo monumento a la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El Dirigente propuso construir la fabrica de siluros y resolvio todos los asuntos que se presentan en su administracion.
					
					Visito en septiembre del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche esta fabrica y dio valiosas instrucciones para desarrollar al estilo coreano la moderna tecnologia de cria de peces.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion del monumento tuvo lugar el dia 27 en esta fabrica.

articles.title: Inaugurado concierto por 30o aniversario de fundacion de Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang
articles.content:
Inaugurado concierto por 30o aniversario de fundacion de Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang
Pyongyang, 27 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el concierto por el 30o aniversario de la fundacion del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en la Casa de Musica Yun I Sang la funcion de apertura.
					
					La disfrutaron el ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, el director del citado Instituto, Hong Kyong Ho, y otros funcionarios de la rama interesada, los creadores y artistas de las entidades artisticas centrales, los profesores y estudiantes de la rama de educacion artistica, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					La vieron tambien los miembros de la Fundacion de Paz Yun I Sang del Sur de Corea y los coreanos residentes en ultramar.
					
					Antes de inicio de la funcion, pronuncio un discurso el viceministro de Cultura, Han Chol.
					
					En la escena iniciada con la musica sinfonica "No te vayas, noche de Pyongyang", se pusieron las obras creadas por Yun.
					
					El concierto se extendera hasta el dia 29.

articles.title: Equipo de futbol de RPDC avanza al cuarto de final
articles.content:
Equipo de futbol de RPDC avanza al cuarto de final
Inchon, 26 de septiembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- En los XVII Juegos Asiaticos, el equipo de futbol masculino de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea avanzo al cuarto de final al doblegar al once indonesio.
					La seleccion, que paso a la fase de knock-out encabezando su zona, se enfrento con el indonesio en los octavos de final.
					
					El numero 19 Pak Kwang Ryong registro un gol con el cabezazo a los minutos 19 e hizo otro tanto el numero 7 Jo Kwang a los minutos 40.
					
					El numero 11 Jong Il Gwan marco el tercer gol un minuto despues desde entonces y el cuarto a los minutos 67.
					
					El partido termino por 4:1 a favor de la RPDC.

articles.title: Equipo de futbol femenino de RPDC avanza a la semifinal
articles.content:
Equipo de futbol femenino de RPDC avanza a la semifinal
Inchon, 26 de septiembre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 el cuarto de final entre el equipo coreano y el chino de futbol femenino de los XVII Juegos Asiaticos.
					A los minutos 73, el numero 3 Ho Un Pyol marco un gol cabeceando el balon que le paso el numero 11 Ri Ye Gyong desde el campo izquierdo.
					
					El partido termino con el marcador de 1:0 a favor del once coreano.
